sn1.22:1.1: To “impact” (phusati, elsewhere “contact” or “touch”) is to create harmful karma, which is the “it” that in turn harms the ones who impacts.
sn1.22:2.1: This verse occurs with a troublesome brahmin at SN 7.4:2.1; as rejoinder to Kokāliya’s attack on Sāriputta and Moggallāna at Snp 3.10:14.1 (see SN 6.10, which has the story without this verse); and at Dhp 125.
